code:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    actor U as User
    participant F as Frontend
    participant B as Backend
    participant D as MongoDB

    Note over U,D: Delete Sleep Entry

    U->>F: Open Sleep History
    U->>F: Select an entry and click "Delete"
    F-->>U: Show confirmation prompt
    U->>F: Confirm deletion
    F->>B: DELETE /sleep-entries/{entryId}
    B->>D: Delete entry by entryId (user scoped)

    alt Entry not found
        D-->>B: Not found
        B-->>F: 404 Not Found
        F-->>U: Show "Entry not found" message
    else Delete success
        D-->>B: Deleted
        B-->>F: 204 No Content (deleted)
        F-->>U: Show success + refresh history/charts
    end

    alt Database unavailable / delete fails
        B-->>F: 503 Service Unavailable
        F-->>U: Show error + allow retry
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
